classData.comment:
/**
 * This addon gets auto-imported when the application is running in SSR mode.
 * Its primary responsibility is to perform client-side cleanup tasks related to Server-Side Rendering,
 * such as removing the SSR data script tag from the DOM after the initial hydration.
 * In the future, it can be extended to handle other SSR-specific client-side logic.
 * @class Neo.main.addon.ServerSideRendering
 * @extends Neo.main.addon.Base
 */
classData.description: This addon gets auto-imported when the application is running in SSR mode. Its primary responsibility is to perform client-side cleanup tasks related to Server-Side Rendering, such as removing the SSR data script tag from the DOM after the initial hydration. In the future, it can be extended to handle other SSR-specific client-side logic.
classData.name: ServerSideRendering
